metadata.title: Roman Farooq's AI & Software Engineering Portfolio
metadata.description: Roman Farooq is an AI-focused software engineer and data science enthusiast dedicated to building intelligent, data-driven, and scalable solutions. Specializing in Python, React, Next.js, and modern machine learning integrations, Roman delivers innovative applications combining advanced analytics with user-focused design.

about.title: About Me
about.description: An AI-focused Software Engineer passionate about developing intelligent, data-driven applications. I specialize in crafting intuitive user experiences, architecting scalable backend systems, and integrating machine learning models into real-world solutions.
about.metaCertDescription: Earned through Meta's rigorous program via Coursera, this certification validates proficiency in front-end development, including React, JavaScript, UI design principles, debugging, version control with Git, and deploying production-ready applications.
about.academicCollaboration: Open to academic collaboration, AI/ML research, and data science projects.
about.techStackDescription: Proficient in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, FastAPI), JavaScript/TypeScript, and frameworks like React, Next.js, and Node.js. Skilled in database management (MongoDB, PostgreSQL), AI API integrations, and cloud deployment. Experienced with CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS and familiar with Docker, Prisma, Redux, Flutter, and scalable backend architecture.

dynamicMenu.title: Dynamic Menu
dynamicMenu.description: An AI-powered mobile app that generates custom recipes from user diets using advanced natural language processing and nutritional analysis. Designed for scalability and rapid iteration.
subDescription: Built with React Native (Expo) and TypeScript for cross-platform mobile development.
Supabase used for authentication and backend services.
Integrated AI models for intelligent diet analysis and personalized recipe generation.
Freemium model with paywalled premium features and modular architecture.
Responsive UI, simple text input, and future-ready for weekly menus/history.

threadoStudio.title: Threado Studio
threadoStudio.description: A web-based 3D clothing customizer with real-time state management and rendering, showcasing interactive front-end engineering and scalable design patterns.
subDescription: Built with Next.js and integrated Three.js using react-three-fiber for 3D rendering.
Implemented real-time image/text decal placement with drag, resize, and rotate functionalities.
Managed application state using Zustand for reactive and modular state management.
Styled with Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive UI.
Included interactive dashboard with color pickers and text formatting tools for personalization.

trendTale.title: TrendTale
trendTale.description: A web/mobile platform that scrapes Google Trends, processes data, and uses AI to generate YouTube content â€” combining web scraping, data analytics, and intelligent content creation.
subDescription: Built with FastAPI and React for the web, React Native for mobile.
Used AI models for generating YouTube content and metadata.
Integrated advanced filters and authentication system.
Styled with Tailwind CSS, used Axios and Framer Motion for UI animations.

easeGPT.title: EaseGPT Chrome Extension
easeGPT.description: A productivity-focused Chrome extension that enhances the ChatGPT experience with advanced features, smart search, and premium AI-powered tools.
subDescription: Implemented custom variables, intelligent search, and tabbed chat UI for improved workflow.
Integrated Google Analytics for usage tracking and quality assurance.
Added in-app purchases for premium AI features and persistent context.

sweepstakesBetting.title: Sweepstakes Betting Website
sweepstakesBetting.description: A prediction market platform with real-time data updates and secure payment integration, showcasing full-stack and data engineering skills.
subDescription: Built with React and Tailwind with Shadcn UI for responsive design.
React frontend using TanStack Query, Chart.js, and Firebase Auth.
Integrated Stripe and Coinbase for fiat and crypto payments.

sweepstakesAdmin.title: Sweepstakes Admin Panel
sweepstakesAdmin.description: Data-driven admin dashboard with role-based access and analytics for managing sweepstakes operations.
subDescription: Implemented role-based admin access with Django Admin and SQL for data management.
Built real-time analytics dashboards using Chart.js.
Integrated Firebase Auth for secure admin login.

autoHub360.title: AutoHub360
autoHub360.description: Next.js platform for scraping, storing, and analyzing automotive accessory data with integrated real-time auction system.
subDescription: Scraped car accessory data using Cheerio and Puppeteer, caching results.
Developed auction system with Socket.io for live bidding and notifications.
Deployed on DigitalOcean Droplet with Nginx and SSL configuration.

saaf.title: Scottish Ashna Ashri Foundation
saaf.description: Backend and admin dashboard with integrated payment systems and location-based features, handling structured and unstructured data.
subDescription: Built with React and Express.js, using MongoDB and GridFS for media storage.
Integrated Stripe, Google Pay, and Apple Pay for donations.
Added Islamic calendar and prayer time calculations based on user location.

blackPearls.title: Black Pearls Website Redesign
blackPearls.description: Migrated a corporate website from WordPress to a modern React stack, improving performance and scalability.
subDescription: Migrated site from WordPress to React and Tailwind CSS for improved performance.
Implemented animations using Framer Motion for engaging UI transitions.
Configured localization support in English and Arabic via i18next.
Utilized React Icons for interactive elements and modern UI practices.

mailer.title: Sirius.Net.Co Mailer
mailer.description: Secure email campaign management tool with template editor, recipient analytics, and advanced authentication.
subDescription: Built with Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and NextAuth.
Used React Quill for email editing and React Email for templating.
Integrated two-factor authentication and Excel file import for recipient list.

carCarePro.title: CarCare Pro
carCarePro.description: A vehicle maintenance app with ML-based maintenance prediction and geolocation services.
subDescription: Manages service history, workshop recommendations, and secure history sharing.
Developed using Flutter and Firebase for Android platform.
Integrated Google Maps to locate workshops and predict maintenance with ML.
Designed a user-friendly dashboard for maintenance reminders.

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
contents: Spearheading the end-to-end development of high-performance, scalable web and mobile applications using the MERN stack, ensuring robust architecture and maintainability.
Leveraging Next.js to build SEO-optimized, dynamic web interfaces with hybrid static & server rendering, resulting in improved user engagement and search visibility.
Designing, deploying, and optimizing mobile-first experiences using React Native, with deep integration of native modules, device APIs, and performance monitoring tools.
Leading comprehensive code reviews and actively contributing to architectural decisions to ensure scalability, maintainability, and adherence to best practices.
Collaborating closely with DevOps to streamline CI/CD pipelines, automate testing, and enhance deployment processes on leading cloud platforms.

associateSoftwareEngineer.title: Associate Software Engineer
contents: Built and optimized robust backend systems using Node.js and Express.js, seamlessly integrated with React.js and Next.js to deliver scalable full-stack solutions.
Participated in sprint planning, code reviews, and cross-functional collaboration to implement innovative new features and improve overall product usability.
Developed, documented, and maintained RESTful APIs, ensuring secure and seamless data flow between frontend interfaces and backend services.
Refactored legacy codebases and applied advanced performance improvements to enhance system efficiency, reliability, and maintainability.
Assisted in technical documentation, onboarding, and provided ongoing support to junior developers through mentorship and code reviews.

supplyChainIntern.title: Supply Chain Intern
contents: Performed HFM, ABC, & XYZ analysis to enhance inventory decision-making.
Assisted in data analysis and reporting for key supply chain metrics.
Participated in cross-departmental meetings to understand operational workflows.
Collaborated in building a three-year inventory projection model to assist strategic planning.
Contributed to "Spares Mapping & Criticality Analysis" for optimized inventory classification.

traineeFrontEndDeveloper.title: Trainee Front-End Developer
contents: Completed practical training in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for responsive web design.
Explored modern frameworks including React, Angular, and Vue.
Built cross-browser compatible websites adhering to web standards.
Contributed to team-based projects, improving collaboration and communication skills.
Gained hands-on experience with version control systems like Git.

bachelors.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
contents: Graduated with a CGPA of 3.42.
Awarded 50% CGPA-based scholarship from October 2020 to July 2024.
Completed coursework in key subjects including Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, and Deep Learning.
Completed a Final Year Project involving advanced software engineering and AI concepts.

intermediate.title: Intermediate in Computer Science (Physics)
contents: Graduated with Grade A.
Specialized in Computer Science and Physics.

matriculation.title: Matriculation (Science)
contents: Graduated with Grade A.
Won first place in an inter-section English writing competition in 8th grade.
Achieved victory in an inter-campus table tennis competition with my team.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.description: Whether you're looking to build a new website, improve your existing platform, or bring a unique project to life, I'm here to help

validation.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters long
validation.messageMaxLength: Message must be less than 1000 characters
